languages.text: "Техножрец Кварц-Крейм утверждает, что вы делаете недостаточно для обеспечения безопасности монастыря Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Техножрец Кварц-Крейм утверждает, что вы делаете недостаточно для обеспечения безопасности монастыря Адептус Механикус. Он требует, чтобы вы отправили туда войска. Вам известно об этом?"

languages.text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
languages.original_text: "Техножрец Кварц-Крейм утверждает, что вы делаете недостаточно для обеспечения безопасности монастыря Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the security of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
"Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the security of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
"Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
"Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
"Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."
"Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

languages.text: "Techpriester Quartz-Krame behauptet, Ihr würdet nicht genug tun, um die Sicherheit des Klosters des Adeptus Mechanicus zu gewährleisten."
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: "Techpriester Quartz-Krame behauptet, Ihr würdet nicht genug tun, um die Sicherheit des Klosters des Adeptus Mechanicus zu gewährleisten."

languages.text: « Le technoprêtre Quartz-Krame affirme que vous n'en avez pas fait assez pour garantir la sécurité du monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: « Le technoprêtre Quartz-Krame affirme que vous n'en avez pas fait assez pour garantir la sécurité du monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »

languages.text: “技术神甫库斯·科莱姆认为你没有保护好机械修会的修道院。”
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: “技术祭司库斯·科莱姆认为你没有保护好机械修会的修道院。”

languages.text: 「技術司祭クォーツ・クレイムは、帝国技術局の修道院の安全は十分に保たれていないと主張していた」
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: 「技術司祭クォーツ・クレイムは、帝国技術局の修道院の安全は十分に保たれていないと主張していた」

languages.text: «El tecnosacerdote Quartz-Krame afirma que no ha hecho lo suficiente para garantizar la seguridad del monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: «El tecnosacerdote Quartz-Krame afirma que no ha hecho lo suficiente para garantizar la seguridad del monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus».

languages.text: "Tekno Rahip Kuvars Krame, Adeptus Mechanicus manastırının emniyetini sağlamak için gerekeni yapmadığınız iddiasında."
languages.original_text: "Tech-Priest Quartz-Krame claims you have not been doing enough to ensure the safety of the Adeptus Mechanicus monastery."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno Rahip Kuvars Krame, Adeptus Mechanicus manastırının emniyetini sağlamak için gerekeni yapmadığınız iddiasında."
